page.title: 07Education in Ballantrae.
page.content: Primary school is non-denominational for both sexes from 4+ to 12 years.7 classes range from 5 to 14 pupils.5 high ceilinged traditional classrooms accommodate 58 pupils in composite classes.Capacity is 120.Mechanised farms,sale of houses to retired people family planning have reduced numbers. Pupil day from 9a.m.to 3.15p.m.has play+lunch intervals.Regional Council pays education costs,books,equipment, travel over 1 mile to and from school,medical,dental,cleanliness checks.Curriculum-Language arts,maths, environmental studies,music,art,crafts physical and religious education.Home study and an interest in the community are encouraged.Staff-Teaching head teacher,2 assistant teachers,janitor.A teacher,auxiliary,cleaner work part time.2 helpers serve containerised 2 course lunches<free to needy pupils>.
